title: WallFlower Women's Sassy Skinny High-Rise Insta Soft Juniors Jeans (Standard and Plus)
description: The softest jeans you'll ever own - WallFlower jeans for women in Insta Soft denim is super soft, super comfy, super you! Over 60% Elasticity Power Stretch fabric with endless holding power and never bags out.

Look fabulous - Our limitless stretch waistband ensures a flattering, gap-free fit that sculpts your curves and creates a sleek silhouette. This high-rise style slims through the hips and thighs for a long, lean look, finishing with a skinny leg opening.

All in the details - Keep it sassy with faux front pockets for super smooth skinny jeans. Combined with our signature super wide waistband and triple button closure detail. Maintain your cool and casual style whether you're on horseback or heading back to school. Complete your 90s, y2k, festival and everyday looks.
Get the perfect fit - Look and feel amazing, from size 0 to 24. Find straight size, mid size and plus size jeans, in 3 different inseam lengths. Made for Every Body. Period.

ECO Love - Join our journey to more eco-friendly processes for more sustainable garments. By 2026, we aim to source 50% of our cotton through the Better Cotton program—supporting water-efficient farming practices that benefit both farmers and the environment.

Our Sassy Skinny is super soft, super comfy, super you! Whether you’re looking for your go to jeans in a fresh wash or you want to try a new fit entirely, WallFlower has a little something for everyone! We are size inclusive (standard, curvy and plus), which means – great jeans for all women. Period
